pages.text: Most discs are dropped from a $(l:creatures/monster-creeper)$(thing)Creeper$() when killed by any $(l:creatures/undead-skeleton)$(thing)Skeleton$() or $(l:creatures/undead-stray)$(thing)Stray$() or generates as chest loot. $(br2)The $(item)Music Discs$() can be played on a $(l:useables/jukebox)$(item)Jukebox$().
